description:
Bunji takes the entire class`s supply of chimaki peels home after lunch. Ma follows, along with others. Mom watches over them as they plot to do something with the chimaki peels... Bunji is eating a ghost-shrimp lunch set. Without thinking about the amount, he dumps all the eggs into the water tank. Out pours a red tide, followed by a harrowing sight... Mom and the gang go on a parent-child picnic on a beautiful spring afternoon. The mothers moan and complain as the kids get all messy from playing in the sandpit, but in truth Mom isn`t as upset as she pretends to be. Bunji gets better at tadpole rescuing every year. He`s surpassed 300 tadpoles this year. When deciding whether or not to throw them away or use as bait, Bunji, Ma and the others form the tadpole rescue team...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chimaki Riot / The Collapse of the Universe / Spring and Muddy / Tadpole Rescue Team
ちまき騒動 / うちゅうのほうかい / 春とドロドロ / おたまレスキュー隊
